data.title: view_pham_chain.py
data.author: unknown
data.label: A_HIGH
data.raw_text:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
üìú PHAM Chain Viewer ‚Äî Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùº ÏãúÍ∞ÅÌôî ÎèÑÍµ¨

Usage:
    python3 view_pham_chain.py                    # Î™®Îì† Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùº Î™©Î°ù ÌëúÏãú
    python3 view_pham_chain.py <chain_file.json>  # ÌäπÏ†ï Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ Î≥¥Í∏∞
    python3 view_pham_chain.py --simple <file>    # Í∞ÑÎã®Ìïú ÏöîÏïΩ Î≥¥Í∏∞
    python3 view_pham_chain.py --compact          # Î™®Îì† Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌïúÎààÏóê Î≥¥Í∏∞
"""

import json
import sys
from pathlib import Path
from datetime import datetime

# üé® ÏÉâÏÉÅ ÏΩîÎìú
class Color:
    HEADER = '\033[95m'
    BLUE = '\033[94m'
    CYAN = '\033[96m'
    GREEN = '\033[92m'
    YELLOW = '\033[93m'
    RED = '\033[91m'
    BOLD = '\033[1m'
    UNDERLINE = '\033[4m'
    END = '\033[0m'

def format_label(label):
    """Í∏∞Ïó¨ÎèÑ ÎùºÎ≤®Ïóê ÏÉâÏÉÅ Ï†ÅÏö©"""
    colors = {
        "A_HIGH": Color.GREEN,
        "A_MID": Color.CYAN,
        "B_HIGH": Color.YELLOW,
        "B_MID": Color.YELLOW,
        "C_LOW": Color.RED
    }
    color = colors.get(label, "")
    return f"{color}{label}{Color.END}"

def format_size(size):
    """Î∞îÏù¥Ìä∏ ÌÅ¨Í∏∞Î•º ÏùΩÍ∏∞ ÏâΩÍ≤å Î≥ÄÌôò"""
    if size < 1024:
        return f"{size} B"
    elif size < 1024 * 1024:
        return f"{size/1024:.1f} KB"
    else:
        return f"{size/(1024*1024):.1f} MB"

def print_signal_bar(signal_name, value, compact=False):
    """Ïã†Ìò∏ Í∞íÏùÑ ASCII Î∞î Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑÎ°ú ÌëúÏãú"""
    if compact:
        bar_length = int(value * 10)
        bar = "‚ñà" * bar_length + "‚ñë" * (10 - bar_length)
        return f"{signal_name[0].upper()}:{bar}"
    else:
        bar_length = int(value * 20)
        bar = "‚ñà" * bar_length + "‚ñë" * (20 - bar_length)
        print(f"         {signal_name:6s}: {bar} {value:.4f}")

def compact_view():
    """Î™®Îì† Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏùÑ ÌïúÎààÏóê Î≥¥Í∏∞"""
    chains = sorted(Path(".").glob("pham_chain_*.json"))
    
    if not chains:
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§.{Color.END}")
        return
    
    print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}{'='*80}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.CYAN}üì¶ PHAM Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ ÏöîÏïΩ ({len(chains)}Í∞ú Ï≤¥Ïù∏){Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*80}{Color.END}\n")
    
    for chain_path in chains:
        try:
            with open(chain_path, "r") as f:
                chain_data = json.load(f)
            
            contribution_blocks = [b for b in chain_data if b["index"] > 0]
            
            if not contribution_blocks:
                continue
            
            # ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏóêÏÑú ÌÉÄÏù¥ÌãÄ Ï∂îÏ∂ú
            title = chain_path.stem.replace("pham_chain_", "")
            
            print(f"{Color.BOLD}üîó {title}{Color.END}")
            
            for block in contribution_blocks:
                data = block["data"]
                idx = block["index"]
                score = data.get("score", 0)
                label = data.get("label", "Unknown")
                timestamp = data.get("timestamp", "Unknown")
                
                # Ïã†Ìò∏ Î∞î (compact)
                signals = data.get("signals", {})
                signal_bars = [
                    print_signal_bar("byte", signals.get("byte", 0), compact=True),
                    print_signal_bar("text", signals.get("text", 0), compact=True),
                    print_signal_bar("ast", signals.get("ast", 0), compact=True),
                    print_signal_bar("exec", signals.get("exec", 0), compact=True)
                ]
                signal_str = " ".join(signal_bars)
                
                print(f"  [{idx}] {score:.3f} {format_label(label):20s} | {signal_str} | {timestamp}")
            
            print()
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  {Color.RED}‚ùå {chain_path.name}: Ïò§Î•ò ({e}){Color.END}\n")
    
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*80}{Color.END}\n")

def simple_view(chain_path):
    """Í∞ÑÎã®Ìïú ÏöîÏïΩ Î≥¥Í∏∞"""
    if not Path(chain_path).exists():
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§: {chain_path}{Color.END}")
        return
    
    try:
        with open(chain_path, "r") as f:
            chain_data = json.load(f)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå ÌååÏùº ÏùΩÍ∏∞ Ïã§Ìå®: {e}{Color.END}")
        return
    
    contribution_blocks = [b for b in chain_data if b["index"] > 0]
    
    print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.CYAN}üìú {Path(chain_path).name}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}\n")
    
    print(f"  Ï¥ù Î∏îÎ°ù: {len(chain_data)}")
    print(f"  Í∏∞Ïó¨ Î∏îÎ°ù: {len(contribution_blocks)}")
    
    if contribution_blocks:
        avg_score = sum(b["data"].get("score", 0) for b in contribution_blocks) / len(contribution_blocks)
        print(f"  ÌèâÍ∑† Ï†êÏàò: {Color.YELLOW}{avg_score:.4f}{Color.END}")
        print()
        
        # ÌÖåÏù¥Î∏î Ìó§Îçî
        print(f"  {Color.BOLD}{'Î∏îÎ°ù':^6} {'Ï†êÏàò':^8} {'Îì±Í∏â':^15} {'ÌååÏùºÎ™Ö':^30}{Color.END}")
        print(f"  {'-'*66}")
        
        for block in contribution_blocks:
            data = block["data"]
            idx = block["index"]
            score = data.get("score", 0)
            label = data.get("label", "Unknown")
            title = data.get("title", "Unknown")[:28]
            
            print(f"  {idx:^6} {score:^8.4f} {format_label(label):^24} {title}")
        
        print()
    
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}\n")

def list_chain_files():
    """ÌòÑÏû¨ ÎîîÎ†âÌÑ∞Î¶¨Ïùò Î™®Îì† Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùº ÎÇòÏó¥"""
    chains = sorted(Path(".").glob("pham_chain_*.json"))
    
    if not chains:
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§.{Color.END}")
        return
    
    print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.CYAN}üì¶ ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùº ({len(chains)}Í∞ú){Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}\n")
    
    for chain_path in chains:
        try:
            with open(chain_path, "r") as f:
                chain_data = json.load(f)
            
            total_blocks = len(chain_data)
            file_size = chain_path.stat().st_size
            contribution_blocks = [b for b in chain_data if b["index"] > 0]
            
            if contribution_blocks:
                avg_score = sum(b["data"].get("score", 0) for b in contribution_blocks) / len(contribution_blocks)
                labels = [b["data"].get("label", "Unknown") for b in contribution_blocks]
                label_counts = {label: labels.count(label) for label in set(labels)}
                label_str = ", ".join([f"{format_label(k)}:{v}" for k, v in sorted(label_counts.items())])
            else:
                avg_score = 0.0
                label_str = "N/A"
            
            print(f"  {Color.BOLD}{chain_path.name}{Color.END}")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ Î∏îÎ°ù: {total_blocks} | ÌÅ¨Í∏∞: {format_size(file_size)} | ÌèâÍ∑†: {avg_score:.4f}")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ Î∂ÑÌè¨: {label_str}")
            print()
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  {Color.RED}‚ùå {chain_path.name}: ÏùΩÍ∏∞ Ïã§Ìå® ({e}){Color.END}\n")
    
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}")
    print(f"\nüí° ÏÇ¨Ïö©Î≤ï:")
    print(f"   python3 view_pham_chain.py <ÌååÏùºÎ™Ö>        # ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ Î≥¥Í∏∞")
    print(f"   python3 view_pham_chain.py --simple <ÌååÏùº> # ÏöîÏïΩ Î≥¥Í∏∞")
    print(f"   python3 view_pham_chain.py --compact       # Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÌïúÎààÏóê\n")

def verify_chain(chain_data):
    """Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Î¨¥Í≤∞ÏÑ± Í≤ÄÏ¶ù"""
    print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}üîç Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Î¨¥Í≤∞ÏÑ± Í≤ÄÏ¶ù{Color.END}")
    print("‚îÄ" * 70)
    
    errors = []
    
    if len(chain_data) == 0:
        errors.append("‚ùå Ï≤¥Ïù∏Ïù¥ ÎπÑÏñ¥ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.")
    elif chain_data[0]["index"] != 0:
        errors.append(f"‚ùå Genesis Î∏îÎ°ù Ïù∏Îç±Ïä§ Ïò§Î•ò: {chain_data[0]['index']}")
    elif chain_data[0]["hash"] != "0":
        errors.append(f"‚ùå Genesis Î∏îÎ°ù Ìï¥Ïãú Ïò§Î•ò: {chain_data[0]['hash']}")
    
    for i in range(1, len(chain_data)):
        prev = chain_data[i-1]
        curr = chain_data[i]
        
        if curr["previous_hash"] != prev["hash"]:
            errors.append(f"‚ùå Î∏îÎ°ù {i}: Ìï¥Ïãú Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÎÅäÍπÄ")
        
        if curr["index"] != i:
            errors.append(f"‚ùå Î∏îÎ°ù {i}: Ïù∏Îç±Ïä§ Î∂àÏùºÏπò ({curr['index']})")
    
    if errors:
        for error in errors:
            print(f"  {Color.RED}{error}{Color.END}")
    else:
        print(f"  {Color.GREEN}‚úÖ Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Î¨¥Í≤∞ÏÑ± ÌôïÏù∏Îê® ({len(chain_data)} Î∏îÎ°ù){Color.END}")
    
    print()

def view_chain_details(chain_path):
    """Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÌååÏùºÏùò ÏÉÅÏÑ∏ ÎÇ¥Ïö© ÌëúÏãú"""
    if not Path(chain_path).exists():
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§: {chain_path}{Color.END}")
        return
    
    try:
        with open(chain_path, "r") as f:
            chain_data = json.load(f)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"{Color.RED}‚ùå ÌååÏùº ÏùΩÍ∏∞ Ïã§Ìå®: {e}{Color.END}")
        return
    
    print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.CYAN}üìú {chain_path}{Color.END}")
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}")
    
    verify_chain(chain_data)
    
    for block in chain_data:
        idx = block["index"]
        
        if idx == 0:
            print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}üå± Block 0 (Genesis){Color.END}")
            print("‚îÄ" * 70)
            print(f"  Timestamp: {datetime.fromtimestamp(block['timestamp']).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}")
            print(f"  Hash: {block['hash']}")
            print()
        else:
            data = block["data"]
            print(f"\n{Color.BOLD}üì¶ Block {idx}: {data.get('title', 'Unknown')}{Color.END}")
            print("‚îÄ" * 70)
            print(f"  ÏûëÏÑ±Ïûê: {Color.CYAN}{data.get('author', 'Unknown')}{Color.END}")
            print(f"  ÏãúÍ∞Ñ: {data.get('timestamp', 'Unknown')}")
            print(f"  Ï†êÏàò: {Color.YELLOW}{data.get('score', 0):.4f}{Color.END} ({format_label(data.get('label', 'Unknown'))})")
            print(f"  ÏÑ§Î™Ö: {data.get('description', 'N/A')}")
            print()
            print(f"  Ìï¥Ïãú:")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ ÌååÏùº: {data.get('hash', 'N/A')[:64]}...")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ CID: {data.get('cid', 'N/A')}")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ Ïù¥Ï†Ñ: {block.get('previous_hash', 'N/A')[:64]}...")
            print(f"    ‚Ä¢ Î∏îÎ°ù: {block.get('hash', 'N/A')[:64]}...")
            
            if "signals" in data:
                print()
                print(f"  Ïã†Ìò∏:")
                signals = data["signals"]
                print_signal_bar("byte", signals.get("byte", 0))
                print_signal_bar("text", signals.get("text", 0))
                print_signal_bar("ast", signals.get("ast", 0))
                print_signal_bar("exec", signals.get("exec", 0))
            
            if "raw_bytes" in data:
                raw_size = len(data["raw_bytes"]) // 2
                print()
                print(f"  Raw Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞: {format_size(raw_size)}")
            
            if "exec_output" in data and data["exec_output"]:
                exec_preview = data["exec_output"][:100].replace("\n", " ")
                if len(data["exec_output"]) > 100:
                    exec_preview += "..."
                print()
                print(f"  Ïã§Ìñâ Ï∂úÎ†•: {exec_preview}")
            
            print()
    
    print(f"{Color.BOLD}{'='*70}{Color.END}\n")

def main():
    if len(sys.argv) < 2:
        list_chain_files()
    elif sys.argv[1] == "--compact":
        compact_view()
    elif sys.argv[1] == "--simple" and len(sys.argv) > 2:
        simple_view(sys.argv[2])
    else:
        view_chain_details(sys.argv[1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
